info:
Bot commands:
/info - Shows available commands.
/bonus_math - Bonus calculation.
/about - Information about the bot.
/yesorno - Sends a GIF with the answer.
/weather - Sends approximate temperature for three days. (How to make a request: /weather City)
/translate - Translator.
/shortlink - Shortens a long link. (How to make a request: /shortlink link)
/reminder - Creates notes.
/generator - Creates strong passwords.
/gallows - Hangman game.
/anonim_mail - Provides a temporary email.
/cancel - Cancels the active operation.
translateChoiceFirstLang: Choose the language to translate from.
translateChoiceSecondLang: Choose the language to translate to.
translateError: Click on the button with the language.
reminderStart: What do you need to do?
reminderError: Check the ID or such a reminder doesn't exist.
generatorInstructions:
Enter parameters to create a strong password.
l - Use lowercase letters.
u - Use Uppercase letters.
d - Use numbers.
s - Use special symbols.
Example: ld 8 (Password length)
gallowAlreadyLetter:
This letter is already in the guessed word.
Guessed: {guessed_word}
gallowCongratulation:
Congratulations! You won.
The guessed word: {guessed_word}
gallowLost: You lost! The hidden word was: {selected_word}
